definition: tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: We describe a case of a traumatic avulsion fracture of the distal phalanx of the hallux.
sentences.chinese: 我們描述了一對拇末節撕脫骨折創傷的情況。

sentences.english: For the first half of the year, complete long-term projects and tie up loose ends.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的上半年，完成長期的計劃並處理好細枝末節。

sentences.english: The president doesn't need to involve herself with this kind of minutia.
sentences.chinese: 總統不需要管這種細枝末節的事。

sentences.english: The trimmings are soon forgotten in a hand-to-hand encounter for life or death.
sentences.chinese: 在徒手生死格鬥中，細枝末節很快就會被忘掉。

sentences.english: Tabloid gossip derives its entertainment value from subtle suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 八卦小報費盡心思，企圖從細枝末節中發現文娛價值。

sentences.english: The bill covers all of these topics, but also countless sideshows and boondoggles.
sentences.chinese: 該法案涵蓋了所有的這些問題，但也有太多細枝末節。

sentences.english: But that was widely shrugged off as a minor detail.
sentences.chinese: 但是這普遍被認爲是一個無需在意的細枝末節。

sentences.english: Men who love wisdom should acquaint themselves with a great many particulars.
sentences.chinese: 喜愛智能的人應該讓自己熟悉很多細微末節的小事。

sentences.english: You can go back and search for details of an exchange you had months ago.
sentences.chinese: 你可以回顧幾個月前的聊天記錄，具體到細枝末節。

sentences.english: Objective To report the operative technique and clinical results of distal phalanx replantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的報道末節斷指再植的手術方法及臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Men who love wisdom should acquaint themselves with a great many particulars .
sentences.chinese: 喜愛智慧的人應該讓自己熟悉很多細微末節的小事。

sentences.english: Mr Le Pen has again called the Nazi gas chambers "a detail of history".
sentences.chinese: 勒龐再次稱納粹毒氣室是“細枝末節”。

sentences.english: the other 80% are just excess trivialities that can be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 其他80%都是可以忽略的細枝末節。

sentences.english: Objective To review the clinical result of replantation of specially amputated fingertip.
sentences.chinese: 目的回顧性分析特殊手指末節及指尖再植的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Your salvation lies in a moment-by-moment recounting of the minutiae.
sentences.chinese: 你的救星就是時時刻刻描述那些細枝末節。
